attributes.action: Stop The Welsh Assembly Imposing The New Drinks Law
attributes.additional_details: The Welsh Assembly want to put a minimum price on the sale of Alcohol this will hit wholesalers as well as bars and clubs. It will put thousands of jobs at risk as people will find it even harder to go out to have a drink. Paraliment needs to put a stop to this!!
attributes.background: So The Welsh Assembly Want To Impose A New Drinks Law That Will See The Price Of Alcohol Rise And Will Put In Danger Jobs In The Pub Industry. As Prices From Breweries And Wholesalers Will Raise!!!!

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Assembly is responsible for.  That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
